name: Doughboy(Game Jam Version)
description:
Doughboy Was developed and won at the sixtysixgames expo Game Jam hosted by GenGames. The theme of the Jam was rules are nothing. so expect the unexpected when playing.  

(Note: This is the version turned in at the Game Jam bugs and all. Eventually a more polished version will be released but no changes will be made to this version of the game)

Credits

Nick Huber

Joe Gawlik

Mike Monroe 

Anthony Wilczynski

Will Andrews

Rules are Nothing
